title: The World Is Watching
creator_credit: Peter Raymont, Jim Monro, Harold Crooks, Great Britain, Ikon TV, Holland, Sveriges TV, Sweden, Channel 4 Television Corporation, TV Ontario and Investigative Productions Inc
brief_description: Cameraman Don Holmberg and award-winning independent Canadian director, Peter Raymont, covered peace talks in Nicaragua, November 1987. What they saw, and what was reported on television networks in the US and Europe was quite different.
